stylus.translation[0].definitions[0].def: the small pointed part of a record player, that touches the record
stylus.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a thing shaped like a pen, used for writing on wax, making marks on metal, writing on a special computer screen etc
stylus.translation[1].definitions[0].def: something like a pen that you can use for touching a computer screen, or writing on it etc
